text: Lee Se-mi is a former South Korean actress, model and singer. She was also a member of girls group LPG. She is also known for her roles in dramas and movies, she appeared in drama Terms of Endearment and she also appeared in movies such as The Romantic President and Attack the Gas Station 2. ==Personal life== She married Min Woo-hyuk who is a actor, model and singer. She and Min Woo-hyuk married in 2012 in Seoul. She left the Entertainment Industry in 2013. She has two children a son and daughter. ==Discography== ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title!! Role!!
